div.head: 浸淫毒瘡
div.div: poison sores soaked [with pus and/or liquid]

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: poison sores soaked [with pus and/or liquid]

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with jin yin chuang 浸淫瘡 , sores soaked [with pus and/or liquid]. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ji yu 鯽魚 quotes Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 : 或腫痛，或赤癢，上下周匝，煩 毒欲死，此浸淫毒瘡也。生鯽魚切片，和鹽搗貼，頻易之 , “When is swollen and painful, or red and itches, covering everything from top to bottom, with fierce vexation bringing people close to death, these are poison sores soaked [with pus and/or liquid] . Cut raw ji yu to pieces and pound with table salt to a pulp [and apply externally]. Frequently change it”.
